snippet: A police official said the taxi driver who hit Luisa Rosario near her Upper Manhattan home had been working for nearly 16 hours.
abstract: Taxicab strikes and kills 88-year-old Luisa Rosario while she was crossing street with right of way in Upper Manhattan
lead_paragraph: A police official said the taxi driver who hit Luisa Rosario near her Upper Manhattan home had been working for nearly 16 hours.

headline.main: Manhattan Woman, 88, Is Fatally Struck by Taxi
headline.print_headline: Woman, 88, Fatally Struck by Yellow Cab in Manhattan
